sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shi zhi 食滯 , food stagnation. Pu ji fang 普濟方 206: 嘔吐門：當辨其脈 證，施以治法。中寒，則脈沉緊，四肢厥冷，飲食不下，當以温暖之藥 調之。挾暑，則脈弦數，煩躁而渴，又當清涼之。停食，則消化之 , “Section of vomiting: It is essential to distinguish the movements in the vessels and pathological conditions, and devise the therapeutic method. In the case of harm caused by cold, the [movement in the] vessels is deep inside and tight. When beverages and food do not descend, they are to be blended with warming medications. If summerheat is involved, the [movement in the] vessels is string-like and increased in frequency. When [the patient] is vexed, restless and thirsty, he should be cooled. When there is stagnant food , dissolve and transform it”.
